summary: External partner call EPIS to update package info after RTS
description: External partner call EPIS to update package info after RTS

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/logistics/epis/packages/update')
request.add_api_parameter("packageCode", "FU2520016900000000000005515757120")
request.add_api_parameter("receiverName", "John")
request.add_api_parameter("receiverPhone", "0972018000")
request.add_api_parameter("totalAmount", "4.5")
request.add_api_parameter("insuranceAmount", "4.5")
request.add_api_parameter("deliveryNote", "Delivery note")
request.add_api_parameter("receiverAddress", "{\"details\":\"25A Nguy\u1EC5n \u0110\u00ECnh Chi\u1EC3u\",\"id\":\"R6846129\",\"type\":\"Home\"}")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/logistics/epis/packages/update')
request.add_api_param('packageCode', 'FU2520016900000000000005515757120')
request.add_api_param('receiverName', 'John')
request.add_api_param('receiverPhone', '0972018000')
request.add_api_param('totalAmount', '4.5')
request.add_api_param('insuranceAmount', '4.5')
request.add_api_param('deliveryNote', 'Delivery note')
request.add_api_param('receiverAddress', '{\"details\":\"25A Nguy\u1EC5n \u0110\u00ECnh Chi\u1EC3u\",\"id\":\"R6846129\",\"type\":\"Home\"}')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
